Class TableFactory

utcn.ordermanagement.ui.TableFactory
public class TableFactory extends Object
A utility class used to render a table in a view

    • createTableColumns

      public static <Model> void createTableColumns(Class<Model> type, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Model> tableView, boolean editable)
      A method used to create the table columns and set the value factory through reflection
      Type Parameters:
      Model - The generic type
      Parameters:
      type - The type on which to map the table
      tableView - The table in which to map the objects
      editable - A boolean true if you want to make the table editable or false instead

    • render

      public static <Model, ID> void render(ICrudRepository<Model,ID> repository, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Model> table, Class<Model> type)
      The method to render the table
      Type Parameters:
      Model - The generic type representing the model/entity
      ID - The generic type representing the identifier's type
      Parameters:
      repository - An instance of a ICrudRepository representing the repository that will use the find, update, delete methods
      table - The table in which to render
      type - The type of the model/entity to map
